short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Safely and securely change the theme of Codeforces

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your Codeforces interface with custom themes tailored to your style. Whether you prefer a sleek dark mode, a vibrant Gruvbox look, or a calming Solarized palette, this extension allows you to switch between multiple themes instantly. Enhance your coding environment for better focus and comfort with the click of a button.

Features:
Choose from multiple themes: Dark, Gruvbox, Solarized, One Nord, Catppuccin, and Dracula.
Quick theme toggle for an enhanced user experience.
Lightweight and easy-to-use interface for seamless theme switching.
